description:
Kisaki Eri has been kidnapped by three men who bear a grudge. Kogoro, Ran, and Conan head to Sojoji Temple, from which they can see the Toto Tower located a kilometer away from the detective agency. Conan uses his phone and the sound of the bell to determine Eri is in either Buroku City or Sutan City. Eri realizes the men have been able to read all her messages and sends Ran a message that looks like a code. Conan solves the code and confirms Eri is in Sutan City. Furthermore, Eri describes the characteristics of the abandoned building to Ran in a message, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le SOS de Mme Misaki (2e partie)
